alert.note: Alert for Coastal Citrus; Inland Citrus; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 13 at 11:02AM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Citrus and northwestern Sumter Counties through 1145 AM EDT... At 1101 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles west of Homosassa, or 14 miles west of Homosassa Springs, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Inverness, Homosassa Springs, Beverly Hills, Inverness Airport, Crystal River Airport, Black Diamond, Homosassa, Inverness Highlands South, Inverness Highlands North, Hernando, Sugarmill Woods, Arbor Lakes, Lecanto, Citronelle, Leisure Acres, Inverness Highlands, Pine Ridge, Heatherwood, Citrus Hills and Gospel Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
